Package tk.shardsoftware.util

Class Minimap

  • java.lang.Object
    • tk.shardsoftware.util.Minimap
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ChooseCollegeDisplay
    public class Minimap
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable
    Draws a Minimap to the screen to help the player navigate.
    Author:
    Hector Woods, James Burnell

    • Constructor Detail

      • Minimap

        public Minimap​(World world,
               float x,
               float y,
               int width,
               int height,
               com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.SpriteBatch batch,
               com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.Stage stage)
        Parameters:
        world - the World object of the game
        x - the x position to draw the minimap
        y - the y position to draw the minimap
        width - the width of the minimap
        height - the height of the minimap
        batch - the SpriteBatch used to draw the map
        stage - the stage to control the minimap
